title: The Adventure Zone LIVE at SDCC 2017 Announcement!
description: Are you planning on going to San Diego Comic Con this year? Clear some time for Tres Horny Boys! We're going to be doing a live TAZ (and MBMBaM!) this year -- listen in for more details! Tickets go on sale THIS WEDNESDAY, so don't miss out!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
